metadata.title: CVE-2024-26134 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: cbor2 provides encoding and decoding for the Concise Binary ObjectRepresentation (CBOR) (RFC 8949) serialization format. Starting in version5.5.1 and prior to version 5.6.2, an attacker can crash a service usingcbor2 to parse a CBOR binary by sending a long enough object. Version 5.6.2contains a patch for this issue.

criterions.comment: cbor2 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
